amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the authorization contained in the bill by 4.9 percent, and would have given the President transfer and reprogramming authority in order to comply with the reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 15 in the Congressional Record of May 21, 1996, to reduce the funds authorized for national intelligence activities by 4.9%.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 235 (Roll no. 187).
